title: Starter Packs Now on Sale in the Special Shop!
context:
Event 03/25/2020

Starter Packs Now on Sale in the Special Shop!

To celebrate the release of WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS, special starter packs are now available in the Special Shop!


Release Starter Pack I
The Release Starter Pack I contains 490 Paid Visiore in addition to enhancing materials for all units.

Purchase Limit: 1

Release Starter Pack II
The Release Starter Pack II contains 2,450 Paid Visiore and the unit Ramada, as well as enhancing materials for her.

Purchase Limit: 1

Release Starter Pack III
The Release Starter Pack III contains 5,000 Paid Visiore and the unit MachÃ©rie Hourne, as well as enhancing materials for her.

Purchase Limit: 1

Metal Slayer Equipment Pack
The Metal Slayer Equipment Pack contains 490 Paid Visiore and the Metal Slayer equipment item. Defeat Metal-type enemies such as Metal Cactuars more easily by equipping a Metal Slayer.

This equipment item can be equipped to units with Jobs that utilize swords.

Purchase Limit: 1

Unit Awakening Pack
The Unit Awakening Pack features items essential for awakening units. This pack includes 2,450 Paid Visiore, a Summon Ticket to select and summon Awakening Prisms, and three Rainbow Fragments of Thought!


Keep a lookout for more Unit, Equipment, and Esper Enhancing Packs in the Special Shop!

Note:
â— Starter Packs and the Metal Slayer Equipment Pack can only be purchased once.
â— The contents and dates listed herein are subject to change without notice.
â— Shops can be accessed via Shop from the Home screen.
â— Items purchased will be sent to Items.
â— Once you've reached the purchase limit for an item, a SOLD OUT icon will appear over it, and you will not be able to purchase it any additional times.
â— Item quantities and purchase limits are restricted to the sale period.


Thank you for your continued support of WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS!

title: WOTV FFBE Beginner's Guide
context:
Important 03/25/2020

WOTV FFBE Beginner's Guide

Welcome to the world of WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS!

Begin your journey into Ardra with the following tips!


Complete Daily Missions!
Earn rewards and Visiore by taking on Daily Missions! Accumulate progress points from clearing Daily Missions to obtain treasure chests!

Chapters 1â€“4 Released!
En route to Fennes, MachÃ©rie's carriage is ambushed by a group of bandits in Leonis. This uncannily organized bandit attack brews doubts about Fennes' integrity. MachÃ©rie absconds from her wedding with Leonis's aid. In turn, Fennes brands Leonis as MachÃ©rie's abductor and declares war.

What will happen to the kingdom of Leonis and MachÃ©rie? Find out more in Chapters 1 through 4!

Take On Beginner Quests & Challenge Missions!
Learn more about the game by playing Beginner Quests and Challenge Missions.
Clear Challenge Missions to get items and materials for enhancing your units.
Challenge rewards will be awarded when you complete Challenge Missions in a straight line horizontally, vertically, or diagonally on the bingo board.
Challenge rewards include fabulous items such as MR+ Unit Guaranteed Summon Tickets and MR rarity equipment.

Form Allies! Make and Invite Friends!
Partner up with Companions that take the field with you during Quests.
Your Player Rank increases as you make more Friends!
You will receive a Friend Gift when you become Friends with another player. You can send and receive gifts such as Friend Medals to and from the Friends you make.

Exchange Friend Medals for valuable items such as unit awakening materials and Rainbow Fragments of Thought in the Mog Shop.
Note: Friend Gifts can be sent to new Friends from 12:00 a.m. (PST) the day after you have befriended them.

Join a Guild and Earn Various Rewards!
Join a guild and receive various benefits, such as Guild Statue upgrades and access to the Barracks.
Guild Medals can also be earned and sent to and from fellow guild members. Exchange these medals for awakening materials and other useful items in the Mog Shop.
Enhance Guild Statues in your guild by making offerings with specific items.
The stronger your Guild Statues, the more guild member benefits you'll receive!
Acquire JP and Bravery when you assign units to the Barracks. JP is required to enhance your units' abilities.
However, take note that the Faith stat of units stationed in the Barracks may decrease.

Complete Quests to Acquire Various Materials!
Complete various Daily Quests to acquire materials such as gil, EXP Cubes, and more.
Keep a lookout for these Quests as it may be easier to collect certain materials based on the day of the week!

Chocobo Expedition!
Send your units on a Chocobo Expedition and earn rewards based on the exploration location you set. Embarked units will return with EXP and various items, including rare ones such as Fragments of Thought or unit shards!
It will take some time for normal expeditions to complete; however, you can shorten the expedition duration by activating High-Speed Expeditions via the use of either Visiore or Expedition Tickets.

Participate in Subquests!
Subquests will appear as you advance through the Story Quests. Complete Subquests to obtain gil, Visiore, and other enticing rewards!

Make Use of Your Units' Affinity in Difficult Battle Situations!
When units with high Affinity for each other are located close together on the map, they will receive a boost to their stats. As Affinity levels increase, the range and effect of the stat boosts also increases. The stats of each unit improve when they have high Affinity with nearby units. Use this to overcome difficult situations!

Your journey into Ardra begins now!


Thank you for your continued support of WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS!

title: Have You Secured Your Account?
context:
Important 03/25/2020

Have You Secured Your Account?

Make Sure to Backup Your Data!
Securing your game account will allow you to restore your data in the event of game data loss.

*Please note that in the event you lose your device or your account, reinstall the game data, or delete the game cache without previously securing your account, your data will not be retrievable.

It is highly recommended that players link their game accounts to their Facebook, Google, or Apple account.

Create a Facebook, Google, or Apple ID Account
If you do not already have a Facebook, Google, or Apple account, you will need to create one before you can back up your game data.

Data Backup for New Players
(1) A prompt to link accounts will be provided to you after going through the Language Settings, Terms & Conditions, Age Verification, and Ad Consent.

(2) At the prompt, select your preferred account: Facebook, Google, Apple, or none. Apple accounts are exclusive to iOS users.

*The account-binding function "Sign in with Apple" is only available for devices running on iOS 13 or newer. In addition, two-factor authentication must be enabled for your Apple account.

(3) If the chosen account is already linked to an existing game account, you will receive another prompt.

(4) Alternatively, should you choose None, you may perform Data Backup after your account has been created via the in-game Menu, followed by Accounts.

Retrieving Data for Existing Players
(1) Upon launching the game, tap Continue to bring up Data Backup.

(2) Select the type of account that has been linked with your game dataâ€”either Facebook, Google, or Apple. Once your data has been retrieved, your Player ID will be shown at the bottom of your screen.

(3) Tap Touch to Start to proceed with your retrieved game data.

Alternate Data Backup Method
(1) Tap Menu on the Home screen, followed by Accounts.

(2) Select your preferred accountâ€”Facebook, Google, or Apple.

(3) If the chosen account is already linked to an existing game account, you will receive another prompt.

Notes
*Game accounts can only be linked to one Facebook, Google, or Apple account at a time.

Thank you for your continued support of WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS!

title: [Updated] Regarding Currently Known Issues  (Added 03:30, 4/9/2020, World Time (PST))
context:
Important 4/9/2020

[Updated] Regarding Currently Known Issues (Added 03:30, 4/9/2020, World Time (PST))

Thank you for playing WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS.

At present, we have confirmed that the following issues exist.

Currently Known Issues
Added 03:30, 4/9/2020, World Time (PST) â—† Rewards for the "Make Your Guild Statues Shine â€” Mission 20" Monthly Mission have been confirmed to be incorrect. The rewards will be amended on 4/15/2020, World Time (PST).
  • Incorrect: Bomb Soup x5, Rainbow Vision Sphere x1
  • Correct: Bomb Soup x5, Rainbow Fragment of Thought x1
    • Added 07:00, 4/8/2020, World Time (PST) â—† Within the Mog Shop, there are currently items of the incorrect element available for trade in the April Summon Medal (B) Exchange Shop. The following items will be made available for trade in short order:
  • Wind Awakening Prisms
  • Ice Awakening Prisms
  • Wind Fragments of Thought
  • Ice Fragments of Thought
    • Added 03:30, 4/9/2020, World Time (PST) The above items are available for trade as of 00:00, 4/9/2020, World Time (PST).
    Added 00:00, 4/8/2020, World Time (PST) The following fixes have been made in regards to the issues affecting crafting recipes on 4/1/2020.

    Targeted Players:
    Those who purchased Flametongue and Coral Sword crafting recipes from the General Shop.

    Compensation:
    The full cost of the Flametongue and Coral Sword crafting recipes will be distributed to affected users' present boxes.

    *Previously possessed crafting recipes have been deleted.
    *It may take some time to deliver compensation to all affected users.

    â—† Some crafting recipes that are currently unusable for crafting were sold in the Shop. Affected crafting recipes: Coral Sword, Flametongue (added 00:00, 4/1/2020)

    *At a later date, the affected crafting recipes will be collected and affected users will be compensated.

    â—† In Multi Quests and Multi Battles, matching cannot occur across different platforms.

    Note that due to many factors including but not limited to device memory capacity and cell service environment,
    the game occasionally crashes, freezes, or otherwise exhibits unstable behavior.
    If you are encountering such a problem, please try the following methods as they have been found to solve the issue for some users.

    â–  Secure sufficient free space on your device
    â–  Play the game only while in an environment with stable cell service
    â–  Restart the app and/or your device
    â–  From the Menu screen, select Options, Download, then Re-Download
    *A stable Wi-Fi environment is recommended for optimal performance.

    â—† All chat channels are displayed in Pacific Standard Time (added 00:00, 4/1/2020).
    *Scheduled to be amended during the next application update.

    We apologize for the inconveniences caused.

    Thank you for your continued support.

title: Announcement Regarding COVID-19
context:
Important 4/8/2020

Announcement Regarding COVID-19

Thank you for playing WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS. The WOTV FFBE development and operations team would like to extend our deepest sympathies to those who have been affected by COVID-19 in any shape or form as the virus continues to spread worldwide.

Currently we are doing our best to continue servicing our game as usual, but we feel obligated to share with you that unfortunately some of the contents scheduled for future release may be affected due to the current situation at hand.

While we are taking all precautions necessary to ensure the safety of our team members, we are doing so in whatever ways least affect the game's operation. However, in the event that the game or its contents are indeed affected, we will endeavor to release a statement via the in-game notices and our official social media channels as soon as possible.

We thank you for your understanding and humbly ask for your patience regarding this matter.

- The WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS Team

Maintenance Period
20:00, 4/7/2020 â€“ 00:00, 4/8/2020, World Time (PST)

We will be carrying out server maintenance during the time period above. The game will not be accessible during maintenance. To prevent any data loss, please refrain from trying to access the game during maintenance.

We recommend that users bind their accounts to either Facebook, Google, or Apple before maintenance begins to prevent possible loss of game data.
*Apple accounts are exclusive to iOS users.

* The account-binding function "Sign in with Apple" is only available for devices running on iOS 13 or newer. In addition, two-factor authentication must be enabled for your Apple account.

We apologize for the short notice and any inconvenience this may cause. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

On the Home screen, tap on Friends and select Search. Input the Player ID of the person you want to invite and tap the Search icon.

The player with the Player ID you enter will be displayed. Finally, select Request to send a Friend Invite.

title: Notice of Delays and Bugs (Added 03:00, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST))
context:
Important 4/1/2020

Notice of Delays and Bugs (Added 03:00, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST))

Compensatory gifts have been distributed to players after the following bugs occurred.
Check your Present Box for details.

1. Players who logged in could not receive their regular Login Bonuses.

We have distributed the Day 1 Login Bonus to players who logged in between 00:00, 4/1/2020 and 00:47, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST). Login Bonuses for Day 2 and onward should be regularly receivable.
(Date and time of distribution: 11:00, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST))

2. Players who enhanced their Guild Statues were unable to clear Daily Missions pertaining to Guild Statue enhancement.

We have distributed the relevant Daily Mission rewards to players who enhanced Guild Statues between 00:00, 4/1/2020 and 00:47, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST).
(Date and time of distribution: 10:43, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST))

Thank you for your understanding, and please accept our apologies for the inconveniences caused.


â–  Notice of Delays and Bugs
 Due to technical issues, all limited events, summons, shops, etc. scheduled to be available from 00:00, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST), have been delayed.

As a result of the aforementioned issues, players reported having the following problems between 00:00, 4/1/2020 and 00:47, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST), when emergency maintenance began.

1. Players who logged in could not receive their regular Login Bonuses.

2. Players who enhanced their Guild Statues were unable to clear Daily Missions pertaining to Guild Statue enhancement.

3. Unit Bonuses were not applied for players who had commenced Chocobo Expedition.

4. Monthly Mission counts were not accurately accounted for.

We are currently investigating the matter and will make further announcements accordingly. To all our devoted players, we deeply apologize for the inconveniences caused.
*We have scheduled to provide compensation to all players at a later date.

title: Emergency Maintenance Complete (Added 06:00, 4/2/2020, World Time (PST))
context:
Important 4/1/2020

Emergency Maintenance Complete (Added 06:00, 4/2/2020, World Time (PST))

The following compensation for the emergency maintenance that occurred on 4/1/2020, World Time (PST) has been delivered to your Present Box.
(Date and time of distribution: 02:00, 4/2/2020, World Time (PST))
ãƒ»Visiore x200
ãƒ»NRG Restore (M) x3

In addition, the following items have been delivered to your Present Box as compensation for various bugs.
(Date and time of distribution: 02:00, 4/2/2020, World Time (PST))
ãƒ»Visiore x200
ãƒ»NRG Restore (M) x3
ãƒ»High-Speed Expedition Ticket (5h) x2

We apologize for the interruption and the inconveniences caused.
*Compensation will be distributed sequentially, so it may take time for the above items to be distributed to all players.


Emergency maintenance will be performed to resolve server issues.

The game will not be accessible during maintenance.
We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience.
Thank you for your patience and understanding.

title: [WOTV FFBE Notice] Regarding Adjustments to Esper Resonance
context:
Important 4/1/2020

[WOTV FFBE Notice] Regarding Adjustments to Esper Resonance

Regarding Adjustments to Esper Resonance

Thank you for playing WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS.

The following adjustments were made at 00:00, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST).

Specifics
â–  Adjustments to Esper Resonance
Previously, if an esper was unequipped from a unit before embarking on a Quest, its Resonance with that unit would gradually decrease. This has been adjusted so that Resonance, once raised, will no longer decrease.
*An esper's Resonance with each unit can be confirmed by tapping Resonance on the Details screen.

Date and Time of Adjustment
00:00, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST)

Precautions
ãƒ» The date, time, and contents of this announcement are subject to change without notice.

Thank you for your continued support of WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS!
